mapper.select: select m.`mfrsname`,b.`brandname`,u.`unitname`, h.`id`,h.`produc_num`,h.`produc_code`,h.`produc_name`,h.`mfrsid`,h.`brandid`,h.`factory`,h.`proid`,h.`unitid`,h.`product_type`,h.`main_capacity`, h.`second_capacity`,h.`produc_factory`,h.`upday`,h.`downday`,h.`tax`,h.`tax_price`,h.`trade_price`,h.`transfer_price`,h.`retail_price` from aa_hly h left join c_mfrs m on h.mfrsid=m.mfrsid left join c_brand b on h.brandid=b.brandid left join c_unit u on h.unitid= u.unitid where id = #{value}
mapper.delete:
delete from aa_hly where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: select m.mfrsid,m.mfrsname from c_mfrs m left join cc_mg mg on m.mfrsid=mg.mfrsid left join c_goods g on g.goodsid=mg.goodsid where g.goodsid=5
select b.brandid,b.brandname from c_brand b left join cc_mg mg on b.goodsid = mg.goodsid left join c_goods g on g.goodsid=mg.goodsid where g.goodsid=5 and b.mfrsid = #{mfrsid} group by b.brandid;
